core.name: Candle
core.description: This dribbled pillar of pigfat with a piece of twine in the middle will allow you to see further in the dark and is not subject to loadshedding. However it doesn't last for very long.

events.onfinish: campaign.warning('%s sputters out in a light breeze. You can relate it %s more times' %(item.displayname(),item.get('/core/charges',0))
